channel.title: MySQL: Too many connections problem
channel.description:
Well I've been using a database for an auth system ( The free one offered at awardspace.com ) and just today, when I tried to view the db on one of my pages, I got this error:
[code]Warning: mysql_connect(): Too many connections in /home/www/weibs.awardspace.com/auth/view/check.php on line 10 Too many connections[/code]
It can't be traffic that's causing it, because there's only 2 people that use it. Is there any way I can fix this?
Thanks in advance,
-Weibs.
